long_description: Amble about in comfort with this package of 2 pairs of Wigwam Wool Rambler socks, which transition from trail to cabin easily and keep feet cozy thanks to a touch of wool. Blend of acrylic and wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Stretch nylon and a touch of elastic help socks retain shape and offer light support. Stay-put tops and legs keep socks in place; seamless toes eliminate irritation. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Amble about in comfort with this package of 2 pairs of Wigwam Wool Rambler socks, which transition from trail to cabin easily and keep feet cozy thanks to a touch of wool.
